title: "Should Inventions Generated by AI Receive Patent Protection?"
excerpt: "As advances in artificial intelligence continue, new innovations will be developed by this technology. But the question remains who is the patent holder—the AI or the AI’s creator? Winston & Strawn partner Brian Ferguson examines this issue and says Congress must expand the definition of “inventors” in the Patent Act to include AI,"
